item.title: Denis Villeneuve's Highly-Acclaimed $714M Sci-Fi Movie Surges On Netflix's Top 10 US Chart
item.description: A Denis Villeneuve sci-fi movie that grossed more than $700 million in addition to being a smash hit with critics charts on Netflix in the U.S.

item.title: Ryan Gosling's Action Comedy With 82% On Rotten Tomatoes Finds Success On Streaming
item.description: After disappointing at the box office, a Ryan Gosling action movie with 82% on Rotten Tomatoes is now connecting with viewers on streaming.

item.title: Why Terminator Genisys Recast The T-1000 With Lee Byung-hun
item.description: Terminator Genisys featured the return of the iconic villain the T-1000, but why was the role recast with Squid Game star Lee Byung-hun?
